thread.section_title: Stewart Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding Staff!!!
thread.title_full: Outstanding Staff!!! - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Agatha M
title: Outstanding Staff!!!
text:
This is the hotel that my company always chooses for us to stay in. I have been checked in multiple times by Nana Who always greets me with a smile and is so courteous in checking me in!
Curtis has helped me multiple times as well to get ice or find my room. They definitely make me feel at home and put the personal touch is in to make you feel that you're not staying in any ordinary hotel.
